title: Wildlife ranger
creator_credit: David Haythornthwaite, Don Murray and Film Australia
brief_description: An insight into the difficulties faced in the daily lives of two rangers in Kakadu National Park, in the Northern Territory. The park is remote and supplies and news must come via mail plane from Darwin.. Also includes wonderful footage of Australia’s unique scenery and wildlife.
creator_credit_for_label: David Haythornthwaite, Don Murray and Film Australia
